Name: Tip1
Text_English: One loss is just a lesson for the next victory!
Text_Korean: 한 차례의 패배를 최후의 패배로 혼동하지 말라!

Name: Tip2
Text_English: You've got to learn to overcome defeat.
Text_Korean: 패배를 극복하는 법을 배워야 한다.

Name: Tip3
Text_English: It is easy if you give up...
Text_Korean: 포기하면 편해... 하지 마....

Name: Tip4
Text_English: YOU JUST ACTIVATED MY TRAP CARD
Text_Korean: YOU JUST ACTIVATED MY TRAP CARD

Name: Tip5
Text_English: Try making a wish next time.
Text_Korean: 다음엔… 승리의 주문을 부탁해.

Name: Tip6
Text_English: If it’s not too much to ask for, please buy me some ice cream.
Text_Korean:
패배했지만 실례가 안된다면
아이스크림 하나만 사주십시오.

Name: Tip7
Text_English: I’m no longer the same old me. I’ll get better tomorrow.
Text_Korean: 더 이상 지금의 내가 아니며 내일은 나아질 것이다.

Name: Tip8
Text_English: The other guy had slightly better weapons.
Text_Korean: 장비가 아주 조금 차이 났을 뿐이다.

Name: Tip9
Text_English: I’m only kneeling to brace myself for a final attack!
Text_Korean: 추진력을 얻기 위해 잠시 무릎을 꿇지.

Name: Tip10
Text_English: I lose! Hahaha... It was totally planned...
Text_Korean: 나의 패배다! 하하하하… 계획대로….

Name: Tip11
Text_English: Our friendship wins.
Text_Korean: 우리는 우정에서 이겼다.

Name: Tip12
Text_English: I admit defeat. But this is just a strategic retreat!
Text_Korean:
패배를 인정하지만 이것은 우리에게
작전상 후퇴일 뿐이다!

Name: Tip13
Text_English: Say to yourself: I’m winning at life, I’m winning at life...
Text_Korean:
관자놀이에 정신을 집중시켜 자신의
가상 승리를 창조합니다.

Name: Tip14
Text_English: Grab some lunch and take a chill pill.
Text_Korean: 밥을 먹으면서 마음을 다스리자.

Name: Tip15
Text_English: I will win as long as I keep up that winning spirit.
Text_Korean: 본심이 패배하지 않는 한 나는 반드시 이긴다.

Name: Tip16
Text_English: Taking a break here and there isn’t a bad idea. You can always try again.
Text_Korean: 잠시 내려놓는 것도 나쁘지 않지. 다시 주우면 되니까.

Name: Tip17
Text_English: The goddess of victory sometimes plays hard to get.
Text_Korean: 패배의 요정이 승점을 망치러 왔어.

Name: Tip18
Text_English: If the door to victory is narrow, go on a diet.
Text_Korean: 승리의 문이 좁다면 날씬해지자.

Name: Tip19
Text_English: Victory is sweeter if you know the bitter taste of defeat.
Text_Korean: 승리의 달콤함을 위해 패배의 맛도 알아야지.

Name: Tip20
Text_English: Okay, so you’ve lost. Time to win now.
Text_Korean: 패배를 했으니 이제 승리를 하자.

Name: Tip21
Text_English: Just proving to the world you're only human.
Text_Korean: 이것으로 인간미를 얻었다.

Name: Tip22
Text_English: You can take it slow. That win isn’t going anywhere.
Text_Korean: 조금 천천히 다가가도 돼. 승리는 도망치지 않아.
